channel.title: Fullstacks on Enxing Xiong

item.title: Nginx
item.description: GYM Backup: mongoexport -d exercise -c workouts -f _id,exercise.name,exercise._id,repeat,weight –type=csv -o workout.csv mongoimport -d exercise -c workouts –type=csv –headerline –file=workout.csv Restore mongodump mongorestore –db exercise ./dump/exercise nodemon screen -ls screen -S myname screen -S myname -X quit screen -r myname ctrl+a d: detach Mongodb db.workouts.update({}, {$set:{“deleted”:false}}, false, true) db.workouts.deleteMany({deleted:true}); nginx: setting server { listen 80 default_server; server_name _; return 301 https://$host$request_uri; } server { listen 443 ssl; ssl_certificate /root/.acme.sh/workoutreport.ga/fullchain.cer; ssl_certificate_key /root/.
